Thief.NAME: Thief
Thief.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Whenever you play an Attack card gain a gold.

Coin Toss.NAME: Coin Toss
Coin Toss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

Loose Change.NAME: Loose Change
Loose Change.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card from your hand.

Best Bag.NAME: Best Bag #1
Best Bag.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 5 gold. NL Exhaust.
Best Bag.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 7 gold. NL Exhaust.

Bouncing Bag.NAME: Bouncing Bag
Bouncing Bag.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Lose 10 gold.

Cheapskate.NAME: Cheapskate
Cheapskate.DESCRIPTION: Deal 5 Damage. NL Bankrupt: draw a card.
Cheapskate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 5 Damage. NL Bankrupt: draw !M! cards.

Old Surprise.NAME: Old Surprise
Old Surprise.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Bankrupt: gain !M! gold. NL Exhaust.

Half Penny.NAME: Half Penny
Half Penny.DESCRIPTION: Bankrupt: apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.
Half Penny.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Bankrupt: apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

Bribe.NAME: Bribe
Bribe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Prosperous: apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

No Coin.NAME: No Coin
No Coin.DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 gold. NL Bankrupt: Draw a card.
No Coin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 gold. NL Bankrupt: Draw !M! cards.

Coin Barrage.NAME: Coin Barrage
Coin Barrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose 50 gold. NL Exhaust.

Hard Crash.NAME: Hard Crash
Hard Crash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 10 gold. NL Bankrupt: gain !M! Strength.
